# senders

**Instance Property**

The senders to include or exclude when you search for messages.

## Declaration

```swift
var senders: [INPerson]? { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property contains one or more [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INPerson] objects, your search should return only messages sent by the specified users. Use the [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INSearchForMessagesIntent/sendersOperator] property to determine whether to search for messages sent by any of the users, or not sent by any of the users.

## Getting the Senders and Recipients

- **recipients**: The contacts who are the recipients of the messages.
- **recipientsOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the recipients in the search criteria.
- **sendersOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the senders in the search criteria.
- **speakableGroupNames**: The names of any groups associated with the message.
- **speakableGroupNamesOperator**: The operator that defines how to use the group names in the search criteria.
